user.title: Set up PhoneTrack
user.description: Enter your PhoneTrack API details to track a device.

data_description.url: Full PhoneTrack API URL including the token (e.g., https://<serverurl>/apps/phonetrack/api/getlastpositions/<token>).
data_description.device_name: The device identifier exactly as it appears in PhoneTrack.
data_description.name: The friendly name shown for this integration in Home Assistant.
data_description.max_gps_accuracy: Maximum GPS accuracy in meters (default: 100). Updates with worse accuracy will be ignored.
data_description.update_interval: How often to poll PhoneTrack for new positions, in seconds (default: 60).
data_description.last_update_timeout: Mark device as unavailable after this many minutes without updates (default: 30).
